error.primary: Would you like to send all the participants a cancellation notice?
error.secondary: If you don't send a cancellation notice, the other participants may not know the meeting is canceled.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete this meeting?
error.secondary: All information on this meeting will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Would you like to send all the participants a cancellation notice?
error.secondary: If you don't send a cancellation notice, the other participants may not know the task has been deleted.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
error.secondary: All information on this task will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Would you like to send a cancellation notice for this journal entry?
error.secondary: If you don't send a cancellation notice, the other participants may not know the journal has been deleted.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete this journal entry?
error.secondary: All information on this journal entry will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete the appointment titled '{0}'?
error.secondary: All information on this appointment will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete this appointment?
error.secondary: All information on this appointment will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' task?
error.secondary: All information on this task will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
error.secondary: All information on this task will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete the journal entry '{0}'?
error.secondary: All information in this journal will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete this journal entry?
error.secondary: All information in this journal will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete these {0} appointments?
error.secondary: All information on these appointments will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete these {0} tasks?
error.secondary: All information on these tasks will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.primary: Are you sure you want to delete these {0} journal entries?
error.secondary: All information in these journal entries will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.title: Save Appointment
error.primary: Would you like to save your changes to this appointment?
error.secondary: You have made changes to this appointment, but not yet saved them.

error.title: Save Task
error.primary: Would you like to save your changes to this task?
error.secondary: You have made changes to this task, but not yet saved them.

error.primary: Would you like to send meeting invitations to participants?
error.secondary: Email invitations will be sent to all participants and allow them to RSVP.

error.primary: Would you like to send updated meeting information to participants?
error.secondary: Sending updated information allows other participants to keep their calendars up to date.

error.primary: Would you like to send this task to participants?
error.secondary: Email invitations will be sent to all participants and allow them to accept this task.

error.primary: Would you like to send updated task information to participants?
error.secondary: Sending updated information allows other participants to keep their task lists up to date.

error.primary: The Evolution tasks have quit unexpectedly.
error.secondary: Your tasks will not be available until Evolution is restarted.

error.primary: The Evolution calendar has quit unexpectedly.
error.secondary: Your calendars will not be available until Evolution is restarted.

error.primary: Delete calendar '{0}'?
error.secondary: This calendar will be removed permanently.

error.primary: Delete task list '{0}'?
error.secondary: This task list will be removed permanently.
